T02TD2199E:80a-1: badzra tsanda mandala bidhi b'a sa dza ka bha dra n'a ma /
T02TD2199E:80a-3: rdo rje gtum po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzang po mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD2199E:80a-4: gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2199E:80a-5: gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud dang ni //
T02TD2199E:80a-6: bla ma'i gdams pa'i lam zhugs nas //
T02TD2199E:80a-7: cho ga bzang po mdor bsdus 'di //
T02TD2199E:80a-8: rang dga' nyes pa dor te bri //
T02TD2199E:80a-9: slob dpon mtshan nyid kun ldan zhing //
T02TD2199E:80a-10: rgyud kyi dbang thob dam tshig brtan //
T02TD2199E:80a-11: gzhan phan bsgrub la dga' ba la //
T02TD2199E:80a-12: gzhan dag gus pas gsol 'debs sam //
T02TD2199E:80a-13: yang na rang bzhin bsgrub don du //
T02TD2199E:80a-14: nus pa dris la tshig gis sbyin //
T02TD2199E:80a-15: dur khrod la sogs dben pa'i gnas //
T02TD2199E:80a-16: bskyed pa'i rim pa gsal byas la //
T02TD2199E:80a-18: rab 'bring mtshan ma thob par bya //
T02TD2199E:80a-19: de nas bla gos legs bgos nas //
T02TD2199E:80a-20: snyim pa me tog gis bkang ste //
T02TD2199E:80a-21: gus pas gsol ba gdab par bya //
T02TD2199E:80a-22: de nas dkyil 'khor bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2199E:80a-23: dur khrod dben pa rdo leb dang //
T02TD2199E:80a-24: sngon byas yid 'ong la sogs su //
T02TD2199E:80a-25: lto 'phye'i sbyor bas brko bar bya //
T02TD2199E:80a-26: brtag cing sbyang dang bsrung bar bya //
T02TD2199E:80a-27: nyes pa med pa'i sa gzhi der //
T02TD2199E:80a-28: rdo rje 'dzin par gsal ba dang //
T02TD2199E:80a-29: bam las skyes pa'i lha mo ser //
T02TD2199E:80a-30: mdzes pa rgyan ldan lus phyed snang //
T02TD2199E:80a-31: bum pa 'dzin la mchod bstod de //
T02TD2199E:80a-32: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2199E:80a-33: spyod pa'i tshul dang rnam thar ni //
T02TD2199E:80a-34: sa dang pha rol phyin pa la //
T02TD2199E:80b-0: lha @80b mo khyod ni dbang du gyur //
T02TD2199E:80b-1: skyob pa sh'akya seng ge yis //
T02TD2199E:80b-2: ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom ltar //
T02TD2199E:80b-3: de bzhin bdag gis bdud sde las //
T02TD2199E:80b-4: rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD2199E:80b-5: lag pas la brdabs pa las //
T02TD2199E:80b-6: dga' ba'i mdangs ldan lha mo yang //
T02TD2199E:80b-7: khyod ni slob dpon mchog yin gyi//
T02TD2199E:80b-8: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las kyis zhes //
T02TD2199E:80b-9: zer zhing sa la thim par 'gyur //
T02TD2199E:80b-10: ro bsal nyes pa spangs pa ste //
T02TD2199E:80b-11: 'thas par bcag cing rnam lnga dang //
T02TD2199E:80b-12: dbugs 'byung gis ni byung par bya //
T02TD2199E:80b-13: yang na me yi las kyis sbyang //
T02TD2199E:80b-14: stong pa'i sngags kyis byin brlabs te //
T02TD2199E:80b-15: rim pas lha yi khang par bsam //
T02TD2199E:80b-16: me tog steng du rdo rje bzhag / bla mas khrus byas rdo rje 'chang //
T02TD2199E:80b-17: bskyed pa'i yan lag kun rdzogs pas //
T02TD2199E:80b-19: tshad med bzhi yis gzhan don bsgrub //
T02TD2199E:80b-20: rnal rgyal la sogs bskyed pa yi //
T02TD2199E:80b-21: slob ma gus pas spos thogs la //
T02TD2199E:80b-22: mchod la tshig 'di brjod par bya //
T02TD2199E:80b-23: h'um byams pa chen po rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD2199E:80b-24: zhes sdang dag pas me long ye shes gsal //
T02TD2199E:80b-25: tum po gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa //
T02TD2199E:80b-26: rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2199E:80b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba //
T02TD2199E:80b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus gnas //
T02TD2199E:80b-29: chos kun bdag dang bral ba'i mchog / dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs su gsol //
T02TD2199E:80b-30: de bzhin lho phyogs la sogs nas //
T02TD2199E:80b-31: h'um snying rje chen po rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD2199E:80b-32: nga rgyal dag pa mnyam nyid ye shes mchog / gtum po gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa //
T02TD2199E:80b-33: rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2199E:80b-34: mtshan rnams yongs su rdzogs pa yi //
T02TD2199E:80b-35: mtshan min thams cad spangs pa ste //
T02TD2199E:80b-36: kun du bzang po sku yi mchog / dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs su gsol //
T02TD2199E:80b-37: h'um dga' ba chen po rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD2199E:80b-38: 'dod chags dag pa so sor rtog / gtum po gdug pa kun 'dul ba //
T02TD2199E:80b-39: rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2199E:80b-40: zhi ba mchog gi chos chen po //
T02TD2199E:80b-41: ye shes spyod pa rnams spyod pa //
T02TD2199E:80b-42: kun du bzang po gsung gi mchog / dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs su gsol //
T02TD2199E:80b-43: h'um btang snyoms chen po rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD2199E:81a-1: tan ye shes mchog / gtum po gdug pa kun 'dul ba //
T02TD2199E:81a-2: rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2199E:81a-3: sems can kun gyi srog chen po //
T02TD2199E:81a-4: rang bzhin rnam dag dri ma med //
T02TD2199E:81a-5: kun du bzang po thugs kyi mchog / dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs su gsol //
T02TD2199E:81a-6: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis //
T02TD2199E:81a-7: khro zhing brjid pa'i skur byas te //
T02TD2199E:81a-8: rkang pa h'um las rdo rje bsam //
T02TD2199E:81a-9: mig gnyis nyi zla 'bar ba ste //
T02TD2199E:81a-10: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yis //
T02TD2199E:81a-11: 'jigs spangs byang shar mtshams song la //
T02TD2199E:81a-12: rang gis bstod cing nga rgyal gyis //
T02TD2199E:81a-13: h'um dkyil 'khor sa gzhi la gnas pa'i //
T02TD2199E:81a-14: lha tshogs bgegs tshogs kun nyon cig / nga ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD2199E:81a-15: nga yi bka' las ma 'da' bar //
T02TD2199E:81a-16: bgegs kyi tshogs rnams 'gro bar gyis //
T02TD2199E:81a-17: gal te khyed rnams mi 'gro na //
T02TD2199E:81a-18: ye shes rdo rje 'bar ba yis //
T02TD2199E:81a-19: mgo bo tshal pa brgyar 'gas shing //
T02TD2199E:81a-20: lus rnams stong du gyur nas ni //
T02TD2199E:81a-21: rnam par 'joms par gdon mi za //
T02TD2199E:81a-22: de bas khyed rnams gzhan du dengs /
T02TD2199E:81a-23: aom badzra tsanda ma h'a ro sha na sarba bighn'an autstsha ta ya phat /
T02TD2199E:81a-24: ces pas bgegs rnams bskrad par bya //
T02TD2199E:81a-25: gar stabs kyis ni bskor ba dang /
T02TD2199E:81a-26: dang por phyin la 'di skad brjod //
T02TD2199E:81a-27: gang dag mi 'gro bgegs yod na //
T02TD2199E:81a-28: lus ngag yid kyi nus pa rnams //
T02TD2199E:81a-29: gzhom phyir khro bo'i phur bus gdab //
T02TD2199E:81a-30: k'i la ya zhes btab na sa kyang //
T02TD2199E:81a-31: a'a ko ta yas brdung bar bya //
T02TD2199E:81a-32: me ri la sogs sngags kyis bsrung //
T02TD2199E:81a-33: gtso bo'i gdon ni gru bzhi ste//
T02TD2199E:81a-34: 'khor lo dri chus zlum por bya //
T02TD2199E:81a-35: kha dog mthun pa'i me tog dgram //
T02TD2199E:81a-36: sa yi cho ga rdzogs pa dang //
T02TD2199E:81a-37: lha ni lhag par gnas par bya //
T02TD2199E:81a-38: rang sar lha rnams rdzogs pa dang //
T02TD2199E:81a-39: mchod bstod me tog spos thogs la //
T02TD2199E:81a-40: h'um dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi //
T02TD2199E:81a-41: thugs kyi sras po rdo rje 'chang //
T02TD2199E:81a-42: dpa' bo rdo rje bde mas 'khyud //
T02TD2199E:81a-43: 'khor gyi khro bo ma lus kun //
T02TD2199E:81a-44: kun nas bdag la dgongs nas kyang //
T02TD2199E:81a-45: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa dang //
T02TD2199E:81a-46: slob ma rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2199E:81a-47: rdo rje can bdag che ge zhes //
T02TD2199E:81a-48: dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs su gsol //
T02TD2199E:81b-0: rjes su brtse @81b bas nyer dgongs te //
T02TD2199E:81b-1: song ni dgyes pas byon par mdzod //
T02TD2199E:81b-2: gzhan yang gsang sngags lha rnams dang //
T02TD2199E:81b-3: 'jig rten skyong ba ma lus dang //
T02TD2199E:81b-4: rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed rnams //
T02TD2199E:81b-5: sangs rgyas bstan pa'i chos skyong rnams //
T02TD2199E:81b-6: gang dag rdo rje'i spyang ldan pa //
T02TD2199E:81b-8: deng bdag 'dri bar gyur pa la //
T02TD2199E:81b-9: bdag dang skal ldan slob ma rnams //
T02TD2199E:81b-10: byin gyis brlab phyir bsrung bar mdzod //
T02TD2199E:81b-11: bum pa lhag par gnas 'dod pas //
T02TD2199E:81b-12: rin chen 'byung khungs las byung ba //
T02TD2199E:81b-13: dri ma med cing lto ba che //
T02TD2199E:81b-14: mgrin phra mchu 'phyang dri zhim chus //
T02TD2199E:81b-15: dkar zhal byas nas mtshan ma dgod //
T02TD2199E:81b-16: rnam rgyal phyag mtshan rdzogs par bri //
T02TD2199E:81b-17: bskrad cing chu dang byang sems dang //
T02TD2199E:81b-18: by'a ghra sing ha dbyig pa dang //
T02TD2199E:81b-19: autpala gzhan gyis mi thub pa //
T02TD2199E:81b-20: ha sa de ba gser dngul dang //
T02TD2199E:81b-21: mu tig mu men bye ru gzhug / nas til gro sran mungga dang //
T02TD2199E:81b-22: ga pur dz'a ti gur gum mchog / tsandan gnyis dang aa ga ru //
T02TD2199E:81b-23: mar dang bu ram sbrang rtsi dang //
T02TD2199E:81b-24: lan tshva rnams kyis lto ba dgang //
T02TD2199E:81b-25: gos kyis mgrin pa bkab pa dang //
T02TD2199E:81b-26: tsu ta la sogs 'bras bu can //
T02TD2199E:81b-27: yang na me tog yod pas brgyan //
T02TD2199E:81b-28: me tog ldan pa'i ra stegs sam //
T02TD2199E:81b-29: ku sha'i gdan la rang sar bzhugs //
T02TD2199E:81b-30: bum pa bhr'um las gzhal yas khang //
T02TD2199E:81b-31: chu skyes nyi zla'i gdan bcas pa //
T02TD2199E:81b-32: rnam rgyal lha rnams tshogs par bskyed //
T02TD2199E:81b-33: gzhan du sa bon gang yin pas //
T02TD2199E:81b-34: chog ma lus rdzogs par bskyed //
T02TD2199E:81b-35: h'um khro bo gtum po gdug pa 'dul //
T02TD2199E:81b-36: rang bzhin ye shes lnga yi dngos //
T02TD2199E:81b-37: rnam dag dri med sku 'chang ba //
T02TD2199E:81b-39: bde gshegs sku la gnyis med 'khyud //
T02TD2199E:81b-40: stong pa nyid kyi bde ster ma //
T02TD2199E:81b-41: dmar ljang gri gug thod pa 'dzin //
T02TD2199E:81b-42: dpa' mo bde ma phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2199E:81b-43: sku gsung thugs dang phrin las kyi //
T02TD2199E:81b-44: gtso bo khro chen 'jigs pa che //
T02TD2199E:81b-45: gdug pa tshar gcod 'jigs pa'i sku //
T02TD2199E:81b-46: phyogs kyi khro bo phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2199E:81b-47: mar me bdug spos dri chab ma //
T02TD2199E:81b-48: zhal zas kyis ni tshim byed pa //
T02TD2199E:82a-0: @82a * // mtshams su bzhugs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2199E:82a-1: lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog ma //
T02TD2199E:82a-2: dgyes pa'i dril bu sgrog mdzad ma //
T02TD2199E:82a-3: khro mo dbang phyug chen mo rnams //
T02TD2199E:82a-5: bstod cing srad bu dang ldan pas //
T02TD2199E:82a-6: phrin las sbyar zhing bzlas par bya ;
T02TD2199E:82a-7: / gtor mas mchod cing gsol ba btab //
T02TD2199E:82a-8: slob ma lhag par gnas pa yang //
T02TD2199E:82a-9: bsrung zhing mdzes ba'i me tog thogs //
T02TD2199E:82a-10: khrus byas gtsang ma'i gos ldan zhing //
T02TD2199E:82a-11: dga' ba'i sems kyis gsol ba gdab //
T02TD2199E:82a-12: dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa che //
T02TD2199E:82a-13: byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa //
T02TD2199E:82a-14: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2199E:82a-15: dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol //
T02TD2199E:82a-16: byang chub sems mchog bdag la stsol //
T02TD2199E:82a-17: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2199E:82a-18: skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD2199E:82a-19: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02TD2199E:82a-20: mgon po bdag ni gzhug par mdzod //
T02TD2199E:82a-21: lan gsum bar du gsol ba gdab //
T02TD2199E:82a-22: 'od kyis phur byas sdig pa sbyang //
T02TD2199E:82a-23: rjes su gzung bas spro ba ni //
T02TD2199E:82a-24: bu tshur theg pa chen po yi //
T02TD2199E:82a-25: tshul chen snod ni khyod yin te //
T02TD2199E:82a-26: gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga mchog /
T02TD2199E:82a-27: khyod la yang dag bshad par bya //
T02TD2199E:82a-28: rdo rje mi phyed mthu yis ni //
T02TD2199E:82a-29: mnyam pa med pa'i ye shes mchog / de bas kun mkhyen thob 'dod pas //
T02TD2199E:82a-30: bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig / bla ma sangs rgyas kun mchod cing //
T02TD2199E:82a-31: rtsa ba yan lag nyes pa spongs //
T02TD2199E:82a-32: ma bsgral 'khor ba'i sems can la //
T02TD2199E:82a-33: snying rje chen po rab bskyed nas //
T02TD2199E:82a-34: bsgral zhing grol ba'i lam la bkod //
T02TD2199E:82a-35: bde bar dbugs ni dbyung bar gyis //
T02TD2199E:82a-36: slob ma'i tshogs kyis sdig bshags la //
T02TD2199E:82a-37: dge bsnyen la sogs rim pas sbyin //
T02TD2199E:82a-38: gang yin bslab pa bstan pa dang //
T02TD2199E:82a-39: slob ma lhar byas yang na ni //
T02TD2199E:82a-40: gnas gsum lhar bcas rtags btab la //
T02TD2199E:82a-41: bla ma dkon mchog gsum po dang //
T02TD2199E:82a-42: bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje ni //
T02TD2199E:82a-43: 'khor bcas ma lus thams cad kyang //
T02TD2199E:82a-44: bdag la dgongs nas gzigs su gsol //
T02TD2199E:82a-45: bdag gis thog ma med pa nas //
T02TD2199E:82b-0: sdig pa @82b bgyis pa ma lus kun //
T02TD2199E:82b-1: bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yi //
T02TD2199E:82b-2: spyan sngags da lta mthol zhing bshags //
T02TD2199E:82b-3: bla ma dkon mchog gsum po dang //
T02TD2199E:82b-4: sangs rgyas kun bdag rdo rje can //
T02TD2199E:82b-6: dge ba mdzad la rjes yi rang //
T02TD2199E:82b-7: bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje ni //
T02TD2199E:82b-8: dus gsum bad gshegs thams cad kyi //
T02TD2199E:82b-9: gsang sngags bdag pos dbang bskur la //
T02TD2199E:82b-10: gsang sngags 'khor lo bskor bar bskul //
T02TD2199E:82b-11: mthu ldan skyon med khyed rnams la //
T02TD2199E:82b-12: skye rgas na 'chi mi mnga' yang //
T02TD2199E:82b-13: 'gro ba'i don du sku sprul pa //
T02TD2199E:82b-15: don dam rang bzhin mtshan ma med //
T02TD2199E:82b-16: mtshan mar mi rtog chos sku la //
T02TD2199E:82b-17: bde gshegs mtshan dpe'i skur snang ba //
T02TD2199E:82b-18: rdo rje can la skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2199E:82b-19: dus gsum mgon po thugs rje can //
T02TD2199E:82b-20: byams pa'i thugs las ma g-yos kyang//
T02TD2199E:82b-21: dgongs pa'i dbang gis khro sprul la //
T02TD2199E:82b-22: gsang sngags lha tshogs kun skyabs mchi //
T02TD2199E:82b-23: de sgrub des mtshon gsung gi chos //
T02TD2199E:82b-24: nyi shu rtsa brgyad drag po'i tshogs //
T02TD2199E:82b-25: chos kyi rang bzhin dri ma med //
T02TD2199E:82b-26: chos kyi mchog la skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2199E:82b-27: sna tshogs skur sprul don mchog bsgrub //
T02TD2199E:82b-28: rin chen skyabs mchog dge 'dun dang //
T02TD2199E:82b-29: 'phags pa gos sngon byang chub sems //
T02TD2199E:82b-30: dge 'dun mchog la skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2199E:82b-31: bla ma dus gsum mgon po dang /
T02TD2199E:82b-32: bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje ni //
T02TD2199E:82b-34: bzhes nas bdag la rjes brtse bas //
T02TD2199E:82b-35: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02TD2199E:82b-36: dang po byang chub sems bskyed nas //
T02TD2199E:82b-37: tshogs gnyis las byung dge ba rnams //
T02TD2199E:82b-38: 'khor ba'i sems can ma lus don //
T02TD2199E:82b-39: byang chub chen por bsngo bar bya //
T02TD2199E:82b-40: byang chub tu yang sems bskyed la //
T02TD2199E:82b-41: sngags kyi dam tshig sbyin par bya //
T02TD2199E:82b-43: bla ma rdo rje slob dpon dang //
T02TD2199E:82b-44: bcom ldan rdo rje gtum po dang //
T02TD2199E:82b-45: dkon mchog gsum dang bstan dga' kun //
T02TD2199E:82b-46: bdag la dgongs nas gzigs su gsol //
T02TD2199E:82b-48: dus 'di nyid nas bzung nas su //
T02TD2199E:83a-1: chub snying por mchis kyi bar //
T02TD2199E:83a-2: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2199E:83a-3: bla na med pa'i byang chub sems //
T02TD2199E:83a-4: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02TD2199E:83a-5: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02TD2199E:83a-6: byang chub tu ni nges gnas pa //
T02TD2199E:83a-7: tshul khrims rnam gsum sdom pa dang ;
T02TD2199E:83a-8: / dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
T02TD2199E:83a-9: sems can don byed tshul khrims rnams //
T02TD2199E:83a-10: so sor bdag gis gzung bar bya //
T02TD2199E:83a-11: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02TD2199E:83a-12: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2199E:83a-13: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02TD2199E:83a-14: 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i //
T02TD2199E:83a-15: dam tshig yin par rgyal bas bsgrags //
T02TD2199E:83a-16: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dang //
T02TD2199E:83a-17: skyon bral rdo rje chen po'i rigs //
T02TD2199E:83a-18: thugs rjes 'brel ba'i slob dpon ni //
T02TD2199E:83a-19: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bya //
T02TD2199E:83a-20: dri ma med pa'i dam tshig chos //
T02TD2199E:83a-21: rin chen rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD2199E:83a-22: nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu //
T02TD2199E:83a-23: sbyin pa rnam bzhin sbyin par bya //
T02TD2199E:83a-24: byang chub chen po las byung ba //
T02TD2199E:83a-25: padma'i rigs mchog dag pa la //
T02TD2199E:83a-26: phyin nang gsang ba theg pa gsum //
T02TD2199E:83a-27: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bya //
T02TD2199E:83a-28: las kyi rigs kyi dam tshig ni //
T02TD2199E:83a-29: thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i //
T02TD2199E:83a-30: sdom pa ma lus thams cad kun //
T02TD2199E:83a-31: de bzhin nyid du so sor gzung //
T02TD2199E:83a-32: byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar //
T02TD2199E:83a-33: mchod pa'i las ni ci nus bgyi //
T02TD2199E:83a-34: ma bsgral ba ni bdag gis bsgral //
T02TD2199E:83a-35: ma grol ba ni bdag gis dgrol //
T02TD2199E:83a-36: dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs phyung bgyi //
T02TD2199E:83a-37: sems can dngos grub che la dgod //
T02TD2199E:83a-38: dkyil 'khor me tog sngon por bcas //
T02TD2199E:83a-39: rdo rje 'chang la dbul bar bya //
T02TD2199E:83a-40: bdud rtsi rnam lnga gtor ma'i tshogs //
T02TD2199E:83a-41: rnam pa kun du bsten par bya //
T02TD2199E:83a-42: thabs kyis bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni //
T02TD2199E:83a-43: snying rje las byung bsgral bar bya //
T02TD2199E:83a-44: lan gsum bar du dam bcas pa //
T02TD2199E:83a-46: rang rang ye shes yig bzhis bstim //
T02TD2199E:83a-47: rdo rje khu tshur dri yi chus //
T02TD2199E:83a-48: mas rim bzhin du brten par bya //
T02TD2199E:83a-49: de rjes mchod pa spro bar bya //
T02TD2199E:83a-50: aa shvadtha dang pa la sha //
T02TD2199E:83a-51: au du mw'a ra la sogs pa'i //
T02TD2199E:83a-52: sor bcu gnyis sam yang na brgyad //
T02TD2199E:83b-0: rtse @83b mo me tog mdzes pas brgyan //
T02TD2199E:83b-1: dkyil 'khor 'dab brgyad rnam lngas byug / shar bltas dbus su sos bzung nas //
T02TD2199E:83b-2: padma'i phyag rgyas dor byas te //
T02TD2199E:83b-4: zhugs pa'i dngos grub brtag pa'i phyir //
T02TD2199E:83b-5: rnam shes dag pa'i so shing 'di //
T02TD2199E:83b-6: sos bzung nas ni dbus su dor //
T02TD2199E:83b-7: bdag dang bla ma steng bltas nas //
T02TD2199E:83b-8: mchog gi dngos grub dam pa yin //
T02TD2199E:83b-9: phyogs su phyin las so so ste //
T02TD2199E:83b-11: thur bltas sa 'og grub pa yin //
T02TD2199E:83b-12: sa la ma lhung mkha' spyod do //
T02TD2199E:83b-13: bdud rtsi byin brlabs thod par blugs //
T02TD2199E:83b-14: rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje'i chu //
T02TD2199E:83b-15: 'thungs shig dam tshig byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD2199E:83b-16: gal te dam tshig 'das pa na //
T02TD2199E:83b-17: dmyal bar nges par sreg par byed //
T02TD2199E:83b-18: aom hr'i:bi shuddha dharm'a sarba b'a pam ni shtsa /
T02TD2199E:83b-19: sho ya bi k'alp'ana aa pa na ya h'um h'um /
T02TD2199E:83b-20: lan gsum skyor chus ngag dag byas //
T02TD2199E:83b-21: lha dang rjes mthun skud pa la //
T02TD2199E:83b-22: sngags btab g-yas dang phrin las g-yon //
T02TD2199E:83b-23: khro bo gtum po'i byin rlabs dang /
T02TD2199E:83b-24: gsang sngags nus pa bla na med //
T02TD2199E:83b-25: skal ldan bar chad med par bsrung //
T02TD2199E:83b-26: su yang gnod pa ma byed cig / ku sha gtsang ma byin brlabs te //
T02TD2199E:83b-27: bzhin bzangs thur nyon dkyil 'khor du ;
T02TD2199E:83b-28: /'jug pa'i rtags rnams brtag pa'i phyir //
T02TD2199E:83b-29: ku sha'i rtsva 'di sngas dang stan //
T02TD2199E:83b-30: thub pas ting 'dzin grub ltar shog / ma nor seng ge bzhin nyal nas //
T02TD2199E:83b-31: mtshan ma ji ltar byung ba ltar //
T02TD2199E:83b-32: bla ma'i mdun du brjod par bya //
T02TD2199E:83b-33: bzang na dngos grub spro ba bskyed //
T02TD2199E:83b-34: gal te ngan na bskrad dang bsrung //
T02TD2199E:83b-35: me yi las kyis bzlog par bya //
T02TD2199E:83b-36: gzhan yang dge ba'i las kun shis //
T02TD2199E:83b-37: bla mas rdo rje can khyod la //
T02TD2199E:83b-38: nang par langs te dkyil 'khor pa //
T02TD2199E:83b-39: nam mkhar bteg la thig gad pa ste //
T02TD2199E:83b-40: bu mo gtsang zhing sdom ldan gyis //
T02TD2199E:83b-41: bkal ba ras bal las byung ba //
T02TD2199E:83b-42: ye shes lnga ni gcig bsdus pa'am //
T02TD2199E:83b-43: yang na sku gsung thugs kyang rung //
T02TD2199E:83b-44: aom aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga ta sarba dharm'a spa ra spha ra aa nu ga ta sarba dharm'a tyanta aa nu pra bishti sarba dharn'a:/
T02TD2199E:83b-45: zhes brjod pas ni bsgril par bya //
T02TD2199E:83b-46: padma'i snod du bzhag nas kyang //
T02TD2199E:83b-47: mi 'chi lnga yis spangs byas la //
T02TD2199E:84a-2: nam mkhar ye shes dza dzas gdab //
T02TD2199E:84a-3: sgo yi bcu gnyis cha dang ldan //
T02TD2199E:84a-4: srid kyang khang pa nyis 'gyur la //
T02TD2199E:84a-5: tshangs pa'i las thig drang byas nas //
T02TD2199E:84a-6: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram m'a ti kra ma h'um //
T02TD2199E:84a-7: tshangs dang zur thig la sogs pa //
T02TD2199E:84a-8: bstan bcos mthong zhing blo ldan des //
T02TD2199E:84a-9: cha ni gang yin rnam par dbye //
T02TD2199E:84a-10: gal te nyes pa'i 'bras bu ni //
T02TD2199E:84a-11: chad na bla ma'i srog g-yo zhing //
T02TD2199E:84a-12: dman lhag nad kyis btab par 'gyur //
T02TD2199E:84a-14: blo ldan nyes pa med par bya //
T02TD2199E:84a-15: gru bzhi sgo dang rta babs bcas //
T02TD2199E:84a-16: dra ba dra ba phyed pas brgyan //
T02TD2199E:84a-17: nyi zla dril bu g-yer khas spras //
T02TD2199E:84a-18: padma khyams dang rdo rje'i phreng //
T02TD2199E:84a-19: dur khrod me ri la sogs pa //
T02TD2199E:84a-20: rnam pa ma lus rdzogs par bya //
T02TD2199E:84a-21: rin chen rnam lnga 'bru phye dang //
T02TD2199E:84a-22: 'byung khungs las byung rnam pa lnga //
T02TD2199E:84a-23: padmar so sor gzhag byas te /
T02TD2199E:84a-24: sngags kyis btab ba yig 'bru bsam //
T02TD2199E:84a-25: ye shes bstims la yig gsum gyis //
T02TD2199E:84a-26: byin gyis brlabs te mthing ga blangs //
T02TD2199E:84a-27: dbang ldan mtshams su drang bya ste //
T02TD2199E:84a-28: 'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste //
T02TD2199E:84a-29: sems can khams ni sgrol byed pa //
T02TD2199E:84a-30: dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa gnas //
T02TD2199E:84a-31: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02TD2199E:84a-32: de bzhin ljang gu drang byas la //
T02TD2199E:84a-33: 'di ni so sor rtog pa dag / dmar po mnyam nyid ye shes te //
T02TD2199E:84a-34: ser po bya ba bsgrub pa la //
T02TD2199E:84a-35: dkar po me long ye shes dag / me tog dor la mtshan ma brtag / thams cad g-yas skor ma nor bar //
T02TD2199E:84a-36: sbom phra chad pa med par bri //
T02TD2199E:84a-37: nyes pa 'byung ba'i rim pa ni //
T02TD2199E:84a-38: tshon mi mnyam zhing yo dang dma' //
T02TD2199E:84a-39: dngos grub nyams par 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD2199E:84a-40: yon pos rtsod la gdung bar 'gyur //
T02TD2199E:84a-41: sbom na nad 'byung gal te phra //
T02TD2199E:84a-42: nor nyams chad par gyur pas na //
T02TD2199E:84a-44: shar dkar lho ser nub phyogs dmar //
T02TD2199E:84a-45: byang phyogs aindra n'i la'i mdog / lte ba mthon mthing 'khyil par bya //
T02TD2199E:84a-46: mtshams sogs cho gas brtag pa dang //
T02TD2199E:84a-47: dur khrod rnams ni rim pas bri //
T02TD2199E:84a-48: rdo rje dkyil 'khor lhar bsgrub pa //
T02TD2199E:84a-49: yol bas bcad pa'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2199E:84b-0: khrus byas @84b dri yis lus byugs te //
T02TD2199E:84b-1: gos bzang gis brgyan lan gsum bskor //
T02TD2199E:84b-2: de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis //

T02TD2199E:84b-6: aom badzra audgha ta sa ma y'a be sha ya h'um /
T02TD2199E:84b-7: bum par rang gnas 'dug byas te ;
T02TD2199E:84b-8: / mchod pa'i rdzas kyis legs brgyan nas //
T02TD2199E:84b-9: dkyil 'khor lha rnams rdzogs par bskyed //
T02TD2199E:84b-10: ye shes bstims la mchod par bya //
T02TD2199E:84b-11: bstod cing glu dang ldan pa yis //
T02TD2199E:84b-12: tshogs kyi 'khor los mchod par bya //
T02TD2199E:84b-13: de nas lhag pa'i lha yang bsdu //
T02TD2199E:84b-14: bzlas pa'i rim pa bzhin du brjod //
T02TD2199E:84b-15: shar du zhi ba'i me las bya //
T02TD2199E:84b-16: de nas shar gyi dbang stegs la //
T02TD2199E:84b-17: slob ma'i cho ga ji lta bar //
T02TD2199E:84b-18: slob dpon dbang dang ldan par bya //
T02TD2199E:84b-19: me tog thogs la tshig 'di brjod //

T02TD2199E:84b-21: gdug pa 'dul mdzad gtum po yis //
T02TD2199E:84b-22: slob ma smin par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2199E:84b-23: bdag la dbang bskur sbyin par mdzod //
T02TD2199E:84b-24: de ltar rim pa rdzogs pa dang //
T02TD2199E:84b-25: de nas slob ma gzhug par bya //
T02TD2199E:84b-26: yol ba'i phyir gnas rim pa bzhin //
T02TD2199E:84b-27: khrus byas sngags 'dis dag par bsam //
T02TD2199E:84b-28: k'a ya b'aka tsitta sarba p'a pam sho dha ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2199E:84b-29: de nas lhar byas gnas gsum du /
T02TD2199E:84b-30: aom badzra bandha trata k'a ya b'aka tsitta /
T02TD2199E:84b-31: zhes pas sdig pa dral byas la //
T02TD2199E:84b-32: rang rang yi ge bsam par bya //
T02TD2199E:84b-33: bgegs bskrad sdig pa gzhom pa dang //
T02TD2199E:84b-34: bla mas rang gi sa bon gyis //
T02TD2199E:84b-35: slob ma'i sdig pa sbyang bar bya //
T02TD2199E:84b-36: aom k'a ya shuddha sarba dharm'a k'a ya shuddho& ham /
T02TD2199E:84b-37: aom b'ak shuddha sarba dharm'a b'ak shuddho& ham /
T02TD2199E:84b-38: aom tsitta shuddha sarba dharm'a tsitta shuddho& ham /
T02TD2199E:84b-39: rnam dag lha yi ngo bor bya //
T02TD2199E:84b-40: gdong pa ras kyis bkab nas ni //
T02TD2199E:84b-41: bu khyod su yin ci la dga' //
T02TD2199E:84b-42: sangs rgyas skun gyi rang bzhin sku //
T02TD2199E:84b-43: slob dpon mgon la skyabs su mchi //

T02TD2199E:84b-49: thar pa chen po'i grong khyer du //
T02TD2199E:84b-50: mgon pos bdag ni gzhug par mdzod //
T02TD2199E:84b-51: slob mas yon phul sngags 'di brjod /
T02TD2199E:85a-2: rang rang gnas su bzhag nas kyang /
T02TD2199E:85a-3: bgegs kyi bar chad bsal bar bya //
T02TD2199E:85a-4: dkyil 'khor la ni bskor byas te //

T02TD2199E:85a-8: bdud bzhi rnam par dag bcom nas //

T02TD2199E:85a-26: aom aa mri ta kunda li ;

T02TD2199E:85a-29: sarba ta th'a ge ta padma dha ri /

T02TD2199E:85a-32: a'atma n'am ni ry'a ta y'a mi /

T02TD2199E:85a-34: aa bhi shanytsi aa dhi tishtha sva mam /
T02TD2199E:85a-35: nub byang rim pas phyag bya'o //

T02TD2199E:85a-37: / sngom pa ma lus pa yang sbyin //
T02TD2199E:85a-38: byin gyis brlab phyir ye shes kyang //

T02TD2199E:85a-40: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis //
T02TD2199E:85a-41: bdag la byin gyis brlab mdzod la //
T02TD2199E:85a-42: rdo rje sems dpa' bla na med //
T02TD2199E:85a-43: bdag la da lta bskyed du gsol //
T02TD2199E:85a-44: sdig bral spos kyis bdug byas nas //

T02TD2199E:85a-48: zag med bde bas yan lag khyab //
T02TD2199E:85a-49: h'um 'di ni rdo rje'i dam tshig ste //

T02TD2199E:85a-53: a'a be sha ya stvam bh'a ya /

T02TD2199E:85a-59: aom badzra tsanda ma h'a ro sha na /
T02TD2199E:85a-60: aa dhishthi te sa ma ya /
T02TD2199E:85a-61: sngags kyis brtan byas lces la aa //
T02TD2199E:85b-0: dge @85b mi dge yi lung bstan bya //

T02TD2199E:85b-7: bdud rtsi lngas bkang ka p'a lar //

T02TD2199E:85b-11: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub rnams //
T02TD2199E:85b-13: aom a'a: h'um badzod ka tha h'um //
T02TD2199E:85b-15: de nas brtsams te khyed rnams kyi //
T02TD2199E:85b-16: rdo rje gtum po nga yin gyi //
T02TD2199E:85b-17: khyed kyis nga la brnyas pa na //
T02TD2199E:85b-18: mi bde ma spangs dus byas nas //
T02TD2199E:85b-19: dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re //
T02TD2199E:85b-20: phyogs bzhi nas ni dngos grub brtag / mdzes pa'i me tog lha la dor //
T02TD2199E:85b-21: gsang ba bla med me tog 'di //

T02TD2199E:85b-30: slob ma'i mgor bcings sngags 'di brjod //
T02TD2199E:85b-31: aom dharma kunda aa bhi shinytsa /
T02TD2199E:85b-32: lha bstim rigs kyi ming yang gzung //

T02TD2199E:85b-37: gdong g-yogs bshus la 'di skad brjod //

T02TD2199E:86a-1: bdag ni slob dpon mchog bgyid do //
T02TD2199E:86a-2: lan gsum brjod nas shar phyogs su //
T02TD2199E:86a-3: padma 'dab brgyad khri la 'dug / rnam rgyal bum pa la sogs pas //
T02TD2199E:86a-4: chu rnams thod pa'am bum par bsdus //
T02TD2199E:86a-5: rdo rje'i glu dang dril bur ldan //
T02TD2199E:86a-6: rigs lnga rig pa'i lha mor ldan //
T02TD2199E:86a-7: bag chags ma lus dag byas te //
T02TD2199E:86a-8: sku gsum dam tshig las byung ba'i //
T02TD2199E:86a-9: ye shes bdud rtsi dri ma med //
T02TD2199E:86a-10: lha yi bdud rtsi rnam dag 'dis //
T02TD2199E:86a-11: mi bskyod rdo rje'i dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2199E:86a-12: aom a'a darsha dzny'a na aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02TD2199E:86a-13: chu yi dbang bskur dam pa 'dis ;
T02TD2199E:86a-14: / sgrib pa rnam pa gsum bral nas //
T02TD2199E:86a-15: mi bskyod rnam dag ye shes 'thob //
T02TD2199E:86a-16: mi bskyod rdo rje dngos grub shog / lugs ma'am thang ga 'bur bris pa'i //
T02TD2199E:86a-17: gser sogs dbu rgyan rin 'byung bsam //
T02TD2199E:86a-18: dbu rgyan rin chen dam pa 'dis //
T02TD2199E:86a-19: sems can tshim par byed pa'i mchog /
T02TD2199E:86a-20: yid bzhin bsam pa 'grub byed pa //
T02TD2199E:86a-21: rdzogs sangs rgyas su dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2199E:86a-22: aom badzra sa mant'a dzny'a na h'um tishtha aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02TD2199E:86a-23: dbu rgyan dbang bskur dam pa 'dis //
T02TD2199E:86a-24: rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs //
T02TD2199E:86a-25: bdag gi mgo la brgyan gyur te //
T02TD2199E:86a-26: rin chen 'byung ldan dngos grub shog / rin chen la sogs rdo rje la //
T02TD2199E:86a-27: snang ba mtha' yas bcug byas la //
T02TD2199E:86a-28: lag tu gtang la tshig 'di brjod //
T02TD2199E:86a-29: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang //
T02TD2199E:86a-30: mi phyed rnam dag 'od gsal stong //
T02TD2199E:86a-31: dam chos 'byung ba'i sgor gyur pa //
T02TD2199E:86a-32: rdo rje chos kyi dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2199E:86a-33: aom badzra pra ti be sha ya dzny'a na aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02TD2199E:86a-34: rdo rje'i dbang bskur dam pa 'dis //
T02TD2199E:86a-35: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin //
T02TD2199E:86a-36: bdag gi rgyud la skyes gyur te //
T02TD2199E:86a-37: snang ba mtha' yas dngos grub shog / dril bur don yod grub pa bcug / lag pa g-yon gtad tshig 'di brjod //
T02TD2199E:86a-38: thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis //
T02TD2199E:86a-39: 'gro don mnyam pa med byed pa //
T02TD2199E:86a-40: 'dod pa'i phrin las rdzogs byed cing //
T02TD2199E:86a-41: dril bu las kyi dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2199E:86a-42: aom aa dhishtha na aa nushth'a na siddhi dzny'a na aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02TD2199E:86a-43: dril bu'i dbang bskur dam pa 'dis //
T02TD2199E:86a-44: dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi //
T02TD2199E:86b-0: gsung gi dngos grub @86b bdag gyur te //
T02TD2199E:86b-1: don yod grub pa'i dngos grub shog / rnam snang bskyed la mtshog ma'i steng //
T02TD2199E:86b-2: 'khor lo thogs pa'i ming sgrogs te //
T02TD2199E:86b-3: rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas //
T02TD2199E:86b-4: byang chub thob pa'i bar du ni //
T02TD2199E:86b-5: cis kyang gzhom par mi nus pas //
T02TD2199E:86b-6: rdo rje'i ming du rab tu grags//
T02TD2199E:86b-7: aom pra ti shodha dharma dh'a tu dzny'a na n'a ma aa bhi shinyts'a mi h'um /
T02TD2199E:86b-8: ming gi dbang bskur dam pa 'dis //
T02TD2199E:86b-9: stong gsum bye ba phrag brgya ru //
T02TD2199E:86b-10: sprul pas 'gro rnams chos ston cing //
T02TD2199E:86b-11: rnam par snang mdzad dngos grub shog / rigs lnga yum gyis ma rig lnga //
T02TD2199E:86b-12: rnam dag ye shes lnga sbyor bas //
T02TD2199E:86b-13: rig pa'i dbang du rgyud pas bstan //
T02TD2199E:86b-14: shar du seng ge'i khri la 'dug / steng du gdugs dkar phub nas kyang //
T02TD2199E:86b-15: phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur te //
T02TD2199E:86b-16: slob dpon rang bzhin 'od dpag mchog / skal ba chen po bdag la gsol //
T02TD2199E:86b-17: bde gshegs rnams kyi dbang bskur ni //
T02TD2199E:86b-18: sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub pa //
T02TD2199E:86b-19: de ni sangs rgyas dpag med do //
T02TD2199E:86b-20: brtul zhugs bla na med pa de //
T02TD2199E:86b-21: ji ltar 'dul bzhin bdag la gsol //
T02TD2199E:86b-22: de nas rnam rgyal bum pa blangs //
T02TD2199E:86b-24: dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni //
T02TD2199E:86b-25: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa //
T02TD2199E:86b-26: gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yi //
T02TD2199E:86b-27: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin pa yis //
T02TD2199E:86b-28: phrin las thogs pa med pa rnams //
T02TD2199E:86b-29: bu yis gzhan don bla med byos //
T02TD2199E:86b-30: khyod ni rdo rje slob dpon yin //
T02TD2199E:86b-31: dus gsum sangs rgyas sras yin no //
T02TD2199E:86b-32: zhes bya dung dang rol mo dbul ;
T02TD2199E:86b-33: / lung bstan bya phyir bla ma yis //
T02TD2199E:86b-34: sprul pa'i skur bcas dga' dang bcas //
T02TD2199E:86b-35: chos gos bzung la 'di skad brjod //
T02TD2199E:86b-36: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin gshegs //
T02TD2199E:86b-37: srid pa'i mtha' ni grub pa'i phyir //
T02TD2199E:86b-38: srid pa'i ngan 'gro nyid las bton //
T02TD2199E:86b-39: kye rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa che ge mo zhes /
T02TD2199E:86b-40: siddhi badzra tsanda te th'a ga ta sa ma ya stvam bhur bhu ba sva:/
T02TD2199E:86b-41: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas ma lus pas //
T02TD2199E:86b-42: khyod la lung bstan byas pa 'di //
T02TD2199E:86b-43: gsang sngags rdo rje'i mthu yin pas //
T02TD2199E:86b-44: dad pas 'di la spro bar gyis //
T02TD2199E:86b-45: de nas rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin //
T02TD2199E:87a-2: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2199E:87a-3: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na bsnams //
T02TD2199E:87a-4: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02TD2199E:87a-5: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
T02TD2199E:87a-6: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta sa ma ya tishtha ae sha stvam dha ra ya mi hi hi h'um /
T02TD2199E:87a-7: de nas dril bu sbyin byas te //
T02TD2199E:87a-8: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
T02TD2199E:87a-9: shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gro ba //
T02TD2199E:87a-10: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02TD2199E:87a-11: byang chub mchog tu rgyal bas bzhed //
T02TD2199E:87a-12: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddha ghanda sa ma ya tishtha ae sha stvam dha ra ya mi hi hi h'um /
T02TD2199E:87a-13: ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
T02TD2199E:87a-14: mi shes rab rib bsal ba ltar ;
T02TD2199E:87a-15: / bu khyod kyi yang mi shes pa'i //
T02TD2199E:87a-16: ma rig ling thog bsal bar bya //
T02TD2199E:87a-17: sman ldan gser gyi thur ma yis //
T02TD2199E:87a-18: ye shes dag par mig 'byed do //
T02TD2199E:87a-19: aom badzra ne tra aa pa ha ra ba tra lam hri //
T02TD2199E:87a-20: de nas me long g-ya' dag bstan //
T02TD2199E:87a-21: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02TD2199E:87a-22: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02TD2199E:87a-23: brjod du med cing gzung du med //
T02TD2199E:87a-24: rgyu dang las las thams cad 'byung //
T02TD2199E:87a-25: de nas rdo rje me long phyar //
T02TD2199E:87a-26: rdo rje sems dpa' me long ltar //
T02TD2199E:87a-27: dag cing gsal la dri ma med //
T02TD2199E:87a-28: sangs rgyas kun bdag rang bzhin ni //
T02TD2199E:87a-29: bu khyod kyi ni snying la gnas //
T02TD2199E:87a-30: zhes bya ho yis mda' gzhu sbyin //
T02TD2199E:87a-31: bskyod la phyogs bzhir bdud la 'phangs //
T02TD2199E:87a-32: de nas h'um las skyes pa yi //
T02TD2199E:87a-33: 'khor lo rkang pa'i bar bcug la //
T02TD2199E:87a-34: de ring phan chad 'jig rten la //
T02TD2199E:87a-35: skyob pa rnams kyis 'khor lo bskor //
T02TD2199E:87a-36: chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med //
T02TD2199E:87a-37: kun du dri med sdig dang bral //
T02TD2199E:87a-38: de nas dud byin bus nas kyang //
T02TD2199E:87a-39: chos kyi dung ni bla na med //
T02TD2199E:87a-40: som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing //
T02TD2199E:87a-41: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis su //
T02TD2199E:87a-42: sangs rgyas spyod pa'i tshul gyi mchog /'jig rten 'dir ni rab tu sgrogs //
T02TD2199E:87a-43: de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la //
T02TD2199E:87a-44: phan btags drin du gzo zhes bya //
T02TD2199E:87a-46: khyod la rjes su srung bar byed //
T02TD2199E:87a-47: de nas rigs lngar bsam byas la //
T02TD2199E:87a-48: 'jig rten khams ni ma lus par //
T02TD2199E:87a-49: sems can ma lus drang ba'i phyir //
T02TD2199E:87a-50: chags pa med pa'i bsam pa yis //
T02TD2199E:87a-51: ji ltar gdul bya sna tshogs pa'i //
T02TD2199E:87b-0: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar @87b gyis ;
T02TD2199E:87b-1: / de bzhin rigs kyis gang 'dul ba //
T02TD2199E:87b-2: khyod kyi phrin las mchog yin no //
T02TD2199E:87b-3: de nas slar yang rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD2199E:87b-4: gsal bar byas te tshig 'di brjod //
T02TD2199E:87b-5: deng nas bzung nas rigs kyi bus //
T02TD2199E:87b-6: zhi rgyas dang nga dang gsad pa dang //
T02TD2199E:87b-7: dgug dang bcing dang bsreg pa dang //
T02TD2199E:87b-8: bskrad dang g-yo ba la sogs pa'i //
T02TD2199E:87b-9: phrin las sna tshogs bsgrub par gyis //
T02TD2199E:87b-10: ral gri mig sman sa 'og dang //
T02TD2199E:87b-11: mchil lham de bzhin ri lu ste //
T02TD2199E:87b-12: thun mong dngos grub ma lus pa //
T02TD2199E:87b-13: de dag khyod kyis bsgrub par gyis //
T02TD2199E:87b-14: ma lus gnang pa sbyin par bya //
T02TD2199E:87b-15: bde bar dbugs dbyung rnams kyang sbyin //
T02TD2199E:87b-16: khyad par bkra shis dbang rnams kyang //
T02TD2199E:87b-17: rim pa bzhin du rdzogs par bya //
T02TD2199E:87b-18: gal te gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba //
T02TD2199E:87b-19: bzhin bzangs mig yangs lang tshor ldan //
T02TD2199E:87b-20: lus la dri yis byugs byas te //
T02TD2199E:87b-21: rtse dang dgod pas g-yo byas la //
T02TD2199E:87b-22: thabs dang shes rab gnyis pha ba ste //
T02TD2199E:87b-23: nor bu byang chub sems ltung bas //
T02TD2199E:87b-24: bde gshegs khu ba mtheb srin gyis //
T02TD2199E:87b-25: drir bcas slob ma'i kha ru dbab //
T02TD2199E:87b-26: aa ho su khas de btung ngo //
T02TD2199E:87b-27: rdo rje ro yis nyon mongs 'joms //
T02TD2199E:87b-28: mtshan ldan bde ba bskyed pa de //
T02TD2199E:87b-29: yol bas bar bcad snyoms 'jug brtsam //
T02TD2199E:87b-30: bsrub dang srubs pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2199E:87b-31: sgra yi rgyun med longs spyod kyi //
T02TD2199E:87b-32: rlabs kyi rgyun ni chad pa las //
T02TD2199E:87b-33: lhan cig skyes pa ye shes kyang /
T02TD2199E:87b-34: rgyun gyi rnal 'byor dran par bya //
T02TD2199E:87b-35: skad cig de dang ma bral na //
T02TD2199E:87b-36: mi rtog ye shes skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD2199E:87b-37: de nyid brjod du med pa la //
T02TD2199E:87b-38: brjod med tshig gi dbang du bshad //
T02TD2199E:87b-39: gal te de la mi rtog pas //
T02TD2199E:87b-40: bzhi pa dbang du rgyud du bstan //
T02TD2199E:87b-41: dkyil 'khor rnam lnga'i dbang bskur nas //
T02TD2199E:87b-42: tshogs dang mchod pa rgya chen bya //
T02TD2199E:87b-43: slob ma dad ldan mchog des kyang //
T02TD2199E:87b-44: rta dang glang po ma he dang //
T02TD2199E:87b-45: bu dang chung ma srog dang dbyig / ci yod phyag byas ma zhen pas //
T02TD2199E:87b-46: bla ma mnyes phyir dbul bar bya //
T02TD2199E:87b-47: bla mas slob ma dam pa'i mgor //
T02TD2199E:87b-48: bkra shis brjod cing gdugs phub pas //
T02TD2199E:87b-49: slob ma mchod pa rdzas thogs nas //
T02TD2199E:87b-50: drin len dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor //
T02TD2199E:88a-2: tho rangs tshon bsdus bum par blugs //
T02TD2199E:88a-4: dri bzangs kyis ni thig phyis la //
T02TD2199E:88a-5: sa der zhi ba'i me las bya //
T02TD2199E:88a-6: yang na phongs pa tshim pa dang //
T02TD2199E:88a-7: tsee te'i las la brtson par bya //
T02TD2199E:88a-8: ji ltar rgyud las gsal gyur cing //
T02TD2199E:88a-9: bla ma'i man ngag thob gyur kyang //
T02TD2199E:88a-10: cung zad spros phyir bdag nyid spro bar byas //
T02TD2199E:88a-11: 'on kyang nyes tshogs ci mchis bshags par bya //
T02TD2199E:88a-12: bzang po mdor bsdus cho ga mchog / gzhan phyir bkod pa'i dge ba yis //
T02TD2199E:88a-13: rigs drug gtum po'i lam zhugs nas//
T02TD2199E:88a-14: myur du de yi 'bras thob shog //
T02TD2199E:88a-15: rdo rje gtum po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzang po mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba slob dpon las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2199E:88a-17: // / rgya gar gyi pandi ta zla ba bzang po dang /
T02TD2199E:88a-18: bod kyi lo ts'a ba glan chung dar ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur ba'o //
